name: The Hallway (Daivy)
description:
The Hallway is a 3D runner Game. You start with a flashlight in front of you, but it will gradually fade out. Press space to strike thunder to regenerate the light. Be careful, as you move foward, the path will be more difficult to walk.

Try you best to run further and collect as many fire souls as you can! Good luck!

Hey guys Daivy here, this is my first time making game in 3D environment.  I had so much fun creating it :)  Hope you all have fun playing it. 

Instructions

  • Up arrow key :  Jump
  • Right/Left arrow key:  Move left/right
  • Space key : Strike thunder and regenerate your flashlight

Leave comment below if you have any question/ suggestion or just say hi to me :D

Much appreciate!!
